name: Ext_R5_Citation_ci_re_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Citation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: documentation | justification | citation | predecessor | successor | derived-from | depends-on | composed-of | part-of | amends | amended-with | appends | appended-with | cites | cited-by | comments-on | comment-in | contains | contained-in | corrects | correction-in | replaces | replaced-with | retracts | retracted-by | signs | similar-to | supports | supported-with | transforms | transformed-into | transformed-with | documents | specification-of | created-with | cite-as | reprint | reprint-of
element.definition: The type of relationship to the related artifact.
element.comment: `Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.type` maps to R4B `Citation.citedArtifact.relatesTo.relationshipType`. Has no type mapping `relationshipType` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/related-artifact-type-all|5.0.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
